INSERT INTO SNS ( sns_no, sns_time, sns_content, sns_title, mem_id, sns_pic
) VALUES( sns_ac_seq.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{sns_content}, #{sns_title}, #{mem_id}, #{sns_pic})
mapper.select: select s.*, m.mem_pic mem_pic, m.mem_type mem_type from sns s, member m where s.mem_id=m.mem_id order by sns_no desc
SELECT SNS_PIC FROM SNS WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id} order by sns_no desc
SELECT SUM(SNS_LIKES) FROM SNS where MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNS where MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Letter where MEM_ID = #{mem_id}

SELECT M.MEM_ID MEM_ID, M.MEM_TIME, M.MEM_PIC, M.MEM_TYPE, SUM(S.SNS_LIKES) SNS_LIKES, COUNT(S.SNS_NO) SNS_NO
FROM SNS S, MEMBER M WHERE M.MEM_ID = #{mem_id} AND S.MEM_ID(+) = M.MEM_ID GROUP BY M.MEM_ID , M.MEM_TIME, M.MEM_TYPE, M.MEM_PIC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT S.*, M.MEM_PIC, M.MEM_TYPE FROM SNS S, MEMBER M WHERE S.MEM_ID = #{mem_id} AND S.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID ORDER BY SNS_NO DESC ) A ) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{sns_first} AND #{sns_last}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNS WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
